CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 9 reads: " "And Then I Bid" - Members of the Keystone Bridge Club of Pittsburgh who participated in National Bridge Tournament of the American Bridge Association held in Pittsburgh also week discuss the event.  Included in the group were, left to right: Herbert Reed, Catherine Roberts, Elizabeth Flury, Ethel Adams, Ada Hayes, Agnes Stevenson and Carrie Young.  Back row, left to right: James Roberts, Dan Clark, Fred Davis, Charles Adams, Archer Johnson and J. Spencer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Keystone Bridge Club of Pittsburgh members, front row from left: Herbert Reed, Catherine Roberts, Elizabeth Flury, Ethel Adams, Ada Hayes, Agnes Stevenson, and Carrie Young; back row: James Roberts, Dan Clark, Fred Davis, Charles Adams, Archer Johnson, and J. Spencer, posed outside of Kay Boys Club during Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American Bridge Association
